description:
An hour long TV special containing background information, interviews, fan commentary, movie clips, and behind-the-scenes production process.
The BD release of this special is slightly shorter (49 minutes) compared to the original HDTV broadcast (53 minutes). The BD version has the following alterations:

* A short segment of fan commentary is missing
* A short segment on foreign fans is missing
* A short segment on Kalafina is missing

titles.title: Gekijouban Kara no Kyoukai Tokubetsu Bangumi: Zen Nana-shou no Kiseki
Kara no Kyoukai: Special Program - All 7 Trajectories
劇場版「空の境界」特別番組 -全七章の軌跡-
